mapper.select: SELECT CEO_ID ceoId, CEO_NAME ceoName, COM_NUM comNum, COM_ID comId, COM_NAME comName, COM_ADDRESS comAddress, COM_CATEGORY comCateGory, MIN_PRICE minPrice, DELIVERYPAY deliverypay, FREEDELIVERY freeDelivery, BUSINESSTIME businesstime, DELIVERYZONE deliveryZone, APPDATE appDate from company where COM_ID = #{comId}
